column4: if anyone recognizes me from last night, I was the one who had GRUB MBR corruption issues. That has been fixed, and I booted into Ubuntu fine
unfortunately for me I have bad cdroms or burner
whats the error when you try to run these ?
there is no error. Ubuntu just asks for a password, and when I enter it, it makes the button noise and doesn't do anything
so your wrong password or you think its broke ?
how do I check if I'm in sudoers?
whcih nvidia card do you have
nvidia drivers work well in linux
get the driver from nvidia, it works great
yes, but there are multiple choices
if you're not 64-bit you want IA32
I assume you don't have an AMD64 or intel64
